Title: exponentialTimeDecayedMax
Description: Returns the maximum of the computed exponentially smoothed moving average at index t in time with that at t-1.
value — Value. Integer, Float or Decimal.timeunit — Timeunit. Integer, Float or Decimal, DateTime, DateTime64.
x — Half-life period. Integer, Float or Decimal.
Returns the maximum of the exponentially smoothed weighted moving average at t and t-1. Float64.
Examples: SELECT    value,    time,    round(exp_smooth, 3),    bar(exp_smooth, 0, 5, 50) AS barFROM    (    SELECT    (number = 0) OR (number >= 25) AS value,    number AS time,    exponentialTimeDecayedMax(10)(value, time) OVER (ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS exp_smooth    FROM numbers(50)    );
